mapper.select: select id, user_id, course_id, question, option1, option2, option3, option4, option5, option6, answer, createtime, updatetime, obj1, obj2 from yikaodb.multiple_choice where id = #{id}
select id, user_id, course_id, question, option1, option2, option3, option4, option5, option6, answer, createtime, updatetime, obj1, obj2 from yikaodb.multiple_choice limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into yikaodb.multiple_choice(user_id, course_id, question, option1, option2, option3, option4, option5, option6, answer, createtime, updatetime, obj1, obj2) values (#{userId}, #{courseId}, #{question}, #{option1}, #{option2}, #{option3}, #{option4}, #{option5}, #{option6}, #{answer}, #{createtime}, #{updatetime}, #{obj1}, #{obj2})

insert into yikaodb.multiple_choice(user_id, course_id, question, option1, option2, option3, option4, option5, option6, answer, createtime, updatetime, obj1, obj2) values
(#{entity.userId}, #{entity.courseId}, #{entity.question}, #{entity.option1}, #{entity.option2}, #{entity.option3}, #{entity.option4}, #{entity.option5}, #{entity.option6}, #{entity.answer}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.obj1}, #{entity.obj2})

insert into yikaodb.multiple_choice(user_id, course_id, question, option1, option2, option3, option4, option5, option6, answer, createtime, updatetime, obj1, obj2) values
(#{entity.userId}, #{entity.courseId}, #{entity.question}, #{entity.option1}, #{entity.option2}, #{entity.option3}, #{entity.option4}, #{entity.option5}, #{entity.option6}, #{entity.answer}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.obj1}, #{entity.obj2})
on duplicate key update user_id = values(user_id) , course_id = values(course_id) , question = values(question) , option1 = values(option1) , option2 = values(option2) , option3 = values(option3) , option4 = values(option4) , option5 = values(option5) , option6 = values(option6) , answer = values(answer) , createtime = values(createtime) , updatetime = values(updatetime) , obj1 = values(obj1) , obj2 = values(obj2)
mapper.update:
update yikaodb.multiple_choice
user_id = #{userId},
course_id = #{courseId},
question = #{question},
option1 = #{option1},
option2 = #{option2},
option3 = #{option3},
option4 = #{option4},
option5 = #{option5},
option6 = #{option6},
answer = #{answer},
createtime = #{createtime},
updatetime = #{updatetime},
obj1 = #{obj1},
obj2 = #{obj2},
where id = #{id}
